ch.blinkenlights.android.vanilla

Class MediaUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.blinkenlights.android.vanilla.MediaUtils

  • public class MediaUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides some static Song/MediaStore-related utility functions.

    • Field Summary

        Type indicating ids represent genres.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TYPE_FILE

        public static final int TYPE_FILE
        Special type for files and folders. Most methods do not accept this type since files have no MediaStore id and require special handling.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TYPE_COUNT

        public static final int TYPE_COUNT
        The number of different valid media types.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_SORT

        public static final java.lang.String DEFAULT_SORT
        The default sort order for media queries. First artist, then album, then track number.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ALBUM_SORT

        public static final java.lang.String ALBUM_SORT
        The default sort order for albums. First the album, then tracknumber
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getRandom

        public static java.util.Random getRandom()
        Returns a cached random instanced, creating it if necessary.

      • buildPlaylistQuery

        public static QueryTask buildPlaylistQuery(long id,
                                           java.lang.String[] projection,
                                           java.lang.String selection)
        Builds a query that will return all the songs in the playlist with the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the playlist in MediaStore.Audio.Playlists.
        projection - The columns to query.
        selection - The selection to pass to the query, or null.
        Returns:
        The initialized query.

      • buildGenreQuery

        public static QueryTask buildGenreQuery(long id,
                                        java.lang.String[] projection,
                                        java.lang.String selection,
                                        java.lang.String[] selectionArgs,
                                        java.lang.String sort,
                                        int type,
                                        boolean returnSongs)
        Builds a query that will return all the songs in the genre with the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the genre in MediaStore.Audio.Genres.
        projection - The columns to query.
        selection - The selection to pass to the query, or null.
        selectionArgs - The arguments to substitute into the selection.
        sort - The sort order.
        type - The media type to query and return
        returnSongs - returns matching songs instead of `type' if true

      • buildGenreExcludeEmptyQuery

        public static QueryTask buildGenreExcludeEmptyQuery(java.lang.String[] projection,
                                                    java.lang.String selection,
                                                    java.lang.String[] selectionArgs,
                                                    java.lang.String sort)
        Creates a QueryTask for genres. The query will select only genres that have at least one song associated with them.
        Parameters:
        projection - The fields of the genre table that should be returned.
        selection - Additional constraints for the query (added to the WHERE section). '?'s will be replaced by values in selectionArgs. Can be null.
        selectionArgs - Arguments for selection. Can be null. See ContentProvider.query(Uri, String[], String, String[], String)
        sort - How the returned genres should be sorted (added to the ORDER BY section)
        Returns:
        The QueryTask for the genres

      • buildQuery

        public static QueryTask buildQuery(int type,
                                   long id,
                                   java.lang.String[] projection,
                                   java.lang.String selection)
        Builds a query with the given information.
        Parameters:
        type - Type the id represents. Must be one of the Song.TYPE_* constants.
        id - The id of the element in the MediaStore content provider for the given type.
        selection - An extra selection to be passed to the query. May be null. Must not be used with type == TYPE_SONG or type == TYPE_PLAYLIST

      • queryGenreForSong

        public static long queryGenreForSong(android.content.ContentResolver resolver,
                                     long id)
        Query the MediaStore to determine the id of the genre the song belongs to.
        Parameters:
        resolver - A ContentResolver to use.
        id - The id of the song to query the genre for.

      • shuffle

        public static void shuffle(long[] list)
        Shuffle an array using Fisher-Yates algorithm.
        Parameters:
        list - The array. It will be shuffled in place.

      • shuffle

        public static void shuffle(java.util.List<Song> list,
                           boolean albumShuffle)
        Shuffle a Song list using Collections.shuffle().
        Parameters:
        albumShuffle - If true, preserve the order of tracks inside albums.

      • isSongAvailable

        public static boolean isSongAvailable(android.content.ContentResolver resolver)
        Determine if any songs are available from the library.
        Parameters:
        resolver - A ContentResolver to use.
        Returns:
        True if it's possible to retrieve any songs, false otherwise. For example, false could be returned if there are no songs in the library.

      • queryResolver

        public static android.database.Cursor queryResolver(android.content.ContentResolver resolver,
                                                    android.net.Uri uri,
                                                    java.lang.String[] projection,
                                                    java.lang.String selection,
                                                    java.lang.String[] selectionArgs,
                                                    java.lang.String sortOrder)
        Runs a query on the passed content resolver. Catches (and returns null on) SecurityException (= user revoked read permission)
        Parameters:
        resolver - The content resolver to use
        uri - the uri to query
        projection - the projection to use
        selection - the selection to use
        selectionArgs - arguments for the selection
        sortOrder - sort order of the returned result
        Returns:
        a cursor or null

      • onMediaChange

        public static void onMediaChange()

      • shareMedia

        public static void shareMedia(android.content.Context ctx,
                              int type,
                              long id)
        Creates and sends share intent across the system. Includes all eligible songs found within this type and id (e.g. all songs in album, all songs for this artist etc.)
        Parameters:
        ctx - context to execute resolving on
        type - media type to look for e.g. TYPE_SONG
        id - id of item to send

      • getSongByTypeId

        public static Song getSongByTypeId(android.content.ContentResolver resolver,
                                   int type,
                                   long id)
        Returns the first matching song (or NULL) of given type + id combination
        Parameters:
        resolver - A ContentResolver to use.
        type - The MediaTye to query
        id - The id of given type to query

      • randomSong

        public static Song randomSong(android.content.ContentResolver resolver)
        Returns a song randomly selected from all the songs in the Android MediaStore.
        Parameters:
        resolver - A ContentResolver to use.

      • deleteFile

        public static boolean deleteFile(java.io.File file)
        Delete the given file or directory recursively.
        Returns:
        True if successful; false otherwise.

      • buildFileQuery

        public static QueryTask buildFileQuery(java.lang.String path,
                                       java.lang.String[] projection)
        Build a query that will contain all the media under the given path.
        Parameters:
        path - The path, e.g. /mnt/sdcard/music/
        projection - The columns to query
        Returns:
        The initialized query.

      • getCursorForFileQuery

        public static android.database.Cursor getCursorForFileQuery(java.lang.String path)
        Returns a (possibly empty) Cursor for given file path
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the file to be queried
        Returns:
        A new Cursor object

      • getCurrentIdForType

        public static long getCurrentIdForType(Song song,
                                       int mType)
        Retrieve ID of specified media type for requested song. This works only for media-oriented types: TYPE_ARTIST, TYPE_ALBUM, TYPE_SONG
        Parameters:
        song - requested song
        mType - media type e.g. TYPE_ARTIST
        Returns:
        ID of media type, TYPE_INVALID if unsupported
